daily_fact: Despite the upcoming closure of Boomerang Toys in Tribeca, the community continues to cherish local businesses and support each other, showcasing the strong neighborhood spirit in the area.
topline_md: Brooklyn faces power outages as crews work to restore electricity, while NYC braces for severe weather with freezing rain and dense fog advisories; Mayor-elect Mamdani's swearing-in is set for New Year's Day amid ongoing discussions about public safety and infrastructure improvements.
